careerJourney.title: Your Career Journey in 4 Steps
careerJourney.subtitle: Discover how our AI-powered platform guides you through every stage of your professional development

step1.title: Complete Assessment
step1.description: Take comprehensive psychological tests to understand your personality, strengths, and preferences

step2.title: Get AI Analysis
step2.description: Receive detailed insights and personalized recommendations based on your test results

step3.title: Build Your Plan
step3.description: Create a customized career development plan with clear milestones and actionable steps

step4.title: Achieve Success
step4.description: Follow your personalized roadmap and track your progress toward your career goals

benefits.title: Why Choose NextWise?

testInfluence.title: Your Test Results Will Guide AI
testInfluence.description: The AI will use your completed assessments to create a more personalized career plan
testInfluence.noTestsDescription: Take personality and skills assessments to get AI recommendations tailored specifically to you
testInfluence.bigFive: Helps identify roles that match your personality traits and work preferences
testInfluence.disc: Guides communication style and team collaboration recommendations
testInfluence.belbin: Suggests team roles and leadership opportunities that fit your natural style
testInfluence.hexaco: Provides insights into your values and how they align with different career paths
testInfluence.holland: Matches your interests with suitable career environments and industries
testInfluence.enneagram: Reveals motivation patterns and growth areas for career development
testInfluence.general: Provides valuable insights for your career development journey
testInfluence.aiCombination: AI will combine insights from all {{count}} completed tests
testInfluence.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this test result? This action cannot be undone, but it won't affect previously generated career plans.
testInfluence.deleteSuccessDesc: Test result has been successfully deleted
testInfluence.deleteError: Failed to delete test result. Please try again.
testInfluence.bulkDeleteDescription: This will keep your 10 most recent tests and remove all older ones. This helps declutter your profile while preserving recent results.
testInfluence.bulkDeleteError: Failed to clean old test results. Please try again.
